name: font-converter
title: Font Converter
description: Convert fonts to TTF, WOFF, WOFF2, and EOT formats directly from Raycast
author: meshal

commands.name: convert-font
commands.title: Convert Font
commands.subtitle: Font Converter
commands.description: Convert a font file into one or more formats.

commands.name: generate-font-face-css
commands.title: Generate @Font-Face CSS
commands.subtitle: Font Converter
commands.description: Generate a CSS snippet for the converted font files.

commands.name: preview-font
commands.title: Preview Font
commands.subtitle: Font Converter
commands.description: Preview any installed or custom font.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
